about_the_game:
Close your eyes, and see.


Project Dark is a narrative driven, immersive audio game that draws on the classic “choose your own adventure” genre to create a unique and compelling interactive experience. The game’s impactful choices and realistic binaural audio allow players to become so immersed in the experience that they can play with their eyes closed. Simple mechanics make this a game that can be played by anyone, and we look forward to seeing where this exploration of darkness takes you!

In this first anthology, players will enjoy several episodes set in rich and vibrant worlds that examine the breadth and depth of darkness. Each episode offers a unique and captivating experience that will leave you wanting more. The branching narrative of the game is dependent on your in-game choices, resulting in different storylines and endings depending on your decisions. This results in high replayability, as players can play episodes over again to get different outcomes.

Episodic Content


A Date in the Dark - You’re on a first date in a restaurant that’s in total darkness. As you navigate this unusual experience, you must also navigate the complexities of a first date with a woman named Lisa. Will this be a good first date, or will you strike out in the dark?

Submersive - After recovering ancient treasure, a small scavenger team on an ocean expedition must work together to survive. As the captain of the team, every choice you make could mean the difference between life and death. Will your leadership skills be enough to get your team to safety?

Game of Three - Your morality is put to the test as you find yourself with the power to decide who lives and who dies. Forced to eliminate one of three strangers in each round, you must weigh the value of each life and make the difficult choice of who deserves to survive. As the game progresses, you'll discover shocking truths about your competitors that will challenge your beliefs and force you to question your own value system for life. Will you prioritize your own survival, or will you make decisions based on your moral compass? The choice is yours in this thought-provoking and suspenseful episode of Project Dark.

Cave of Spirits - Adventure across a medieval fantasy landscape as Oswin, a blind cabbage farmer, in his quest to rescue the princess and become a knight in King Aldrich’s court. You will travel with the court jester, making this episode very funny and more of an action comedy. Will Oswin be able to overcome the challenges and emerge as a true hero?

Home Invasion - Mina and her younger brother Samir must defend themselves from an intruder who has broken into their home. As you play, you must stay hidden and avoid detection until you can escape with your lives. Will you be able to outsmart the intruder and get out alive?

Bliss - You’re a coma patient reliving your traumatic past in order to fix your future. With the help of Calm, a mysterious guide, you must confront your demons and find a way to move on. Will you be able to find the path to bliss, or will you be trapped reliving your past forever?


Experience the power of audio storytelling and immerse yourself in the dark and captivating worlds of Project Dark. With each episode offering a unique and engaging experience, this anthology is sure to keep you entertained for hours on end. Play the game with your eyes closed, and let the story take you away.

content_descriptors.notes: Throughout Project Dark's multiple stories, players will never see but will occasionally hear acts of violence, mature language and use of alcohol.

name: Project Dark

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64bit
  • Processor: 2+ Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card must be installed
  • Additional Notes: At least one audio speaker device, e.g. speaker, headset, headphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

esrb.descriptors:
App is a game
Game contains violence against humans
This content occurs in a realistic setting
Reactions to violence are depicted realistically
Violence is referred to
Violence is implied
Violence towards defenseless characters with consequences
Fierce sounds or dark overtones
Pictures or sounds like to be scary (Rarely)
Moderate swearing or offensive gestures (Rarely)
Use of alcohol
Use of alcohol in a first-person perspective
Alcohol rarely shown
Mucus, belching, flatulence sounds.

usk.descriptors: Abstract Violence, Occasional Swearing, Scary Moments

short_description: Project Dark is an episodic, narrative-driven audio game that uses binaural sound and "choose your own adventure" style storytelling to immerse players in its varied worlds. Close your eyes, and see.
